arts.ttl: Bayern’s teen star Lennart Karl leads comeback 6-2 win over Freiburg in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Karl, who was making his ninth league appearance and second start, delivered a timely message to Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann before the World Cup next year by instigating Bayern’s comeback with a goal, assist and sparkling play. Karl replied four minutes later after controlling Olise’s ball with his left foot and scoring with his right, and the youngster returned the favor for Olise to equalize before the break.

arts.ttl: Olise shines against Freiburg as Bayern score six
arts.sum: Michael Olise stole the show with a brace and three assists while Harry Kane continued his incredible scoring record as Vincent Kompany's men pumped six goals past Freiburg.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs Freiburg: Team news and predicted line-up

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs Freiburg – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: The Allianz Arena is set to be the stage as Bayern Munich, the current Bundesliga frontrunners, take on SC Freiburg this Saturday. While Bayern have built a commanding six-point lead at the top with a blistering unbeaten run, Freiburg arrive aiming to find stability mid-table under the stewardship of Julian Schuster. arts.ttl: Neuer partakes final Bayern training session in time for Freiburg fixture
arts.sum: The veteran shot-stopper looks like he has recovered from illness in time to face SC Freiburg on Matchday 11.
